name: Solitaire Makeover Home Design
description:
This is a solitaire card game that will completely free your thoughts, my friends! Design home in this sweet dream and ready for a wonderful makeover journey! This solitaire tripeaks game was combined with both solitaire card game and dream home design game. You can play two types of game at one time and if you are a super fan for classic tripeaks cards games and Home design games, this will be the perfect free card game for you!

Experience a wonderful solitaire card game that is full of fun! Do you want to exercise your mind? This is definitely the one you can't miss out! Like mahjong, and word search games, card games is a great way to keep your mind flexible. By any chance, mental flexibility is always something that everyone needs to face and improve, so come and try it.

It's the best way to relax your body and mind, absolutely choose the home design game. While you could train your brain, you could also relax and just let yourself fall into a fancy makeover world! Select all your favorite items and finish your dream home! It's a great chance for you to know more about creative inspiration, with this makeover part, your imagination will go to another level!

Features:
Hundreds of levels make you never bored!
Luxury and exquisite game design, feast your eyes！
The combination of solitaire and home design brings you double happiness!
Cultivate your design talent and also exercise your brain!
Abundant fun events and mysterious rewards are waiting for you!

It's easy to play, but it's also a brain-burning challenge. Let's see if you could beat the card level and finish your own fancy home!
